children.description: Potentially Droppable and Draggable children (React component or element)

onDrag.description: Callback for drag event. Return true to allow drag, false to disallow. (Function: (source: DraggableItemPosition) => boolean)

onDragMove.description: Callback on mouse move while dragging. (Function: (source: DraggableItemPosition, dest?: DraggableItemPosition) => void)

onDrop.description: Callback for drop event. Return true to allow drop, false to disallow. (Function: (source: DraggableItemPosition, dest?: DraggableItemPosition) => boolean)
